<id>; https://blog.jgc.org/2010/12/write-your-your-passwords-down.html </html </ id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T13：30：40.240325Z </updated>; <link href =“ https://blog.jgc.org/2010/2010/12/write-write-write-your--your-pass-your-pass-down.html.html <uctor>; <NAME>; smartmic </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=smartmic </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; <content type =“ html”>; <img src ='>; <img src =“ https://2.bp.blogspot.com/_dt4ksd7hyde/tqt8wneqbxi/aaaaaaaaaaaaty/wzh9zjbvqqqc/s400/s400/img_0945.jpg“ />;<br />;我对密码安全的建议是把它们写下来并放在钱包里，为每个网站使用不同的密码，并确保密码长度至少为 12 个字符，并且包含大写、小写、数字和特殊字符。我使用选择随机字符的程序生成密码，并将其打印在一张纸上。我使用这张表找到每个网站的密码，方法是找到与网站名称中的字母相对应的列的交集并沿对角线读出。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#write-your-passwords-down-2010" target="_blank">; [摘要] </a>; <a a href =“ https：// news。 ycombinator.com/item?id=37033814“ target =“ _ blank”>; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; </entry>; <entry xml：base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed。 xml“>; <names>; <Names>; <name>; Thunderbong </name>; <uri>; <URI>; https：//news.ycombinator。 com/user?id=thunderbong</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;Orb 是一个免费开源的 Web 桌面，它在 Web 浏览器中模拟类似 Windows 的桌面。您可以以简单且安全的方式使用它来访问服务器或NAS上的文件。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#orb-is-is-a-free-and-open-source-web-desktop" target="_blank">; [摘要] </a>; <a href =“ https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id = 37031673” target =“ _ blank”>; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base =“ https：// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;PSA：英特尔显卡驱动程序现在默认收集遥测数据</stitle>; <id>;https://www.techpowerup.com/312122/psa- intel-graphics-drivers-now-collect-telemetry-by-default</id>; <更新>;2023-08-07T12:53:40.412247Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.techpowerup.com /312122/psa-intel-graphics-drivers-now-collect-telemetry-by-default"/>; <作者>; <名称>;baal80spam</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id = baal80spam </uri>; </uri>; <content type =“ html”>; <img src =“ https://tpucdn.com/img/img/vd7bo9pj56uuwpyk_thm.jpg_thm.jpg” />;<br />;最新版本的英特尔 Arc GPU 图形软件引入了一个称为计算改进计划 (CIP) 的数据收集组件，用于跟踪 PC 使用情况和性能。英特尔创建了一个网页，解释说CIP不会收集敏感的个人信息。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#psa-intel-graphics-drivers-drivers-now-collect-telemetry-by-default" target="_blank">; [摘要] </a>; <a href =“ https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id = 37033475” target =“ _ blank”>; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base =“ https：// https：// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;NASA 帮助从加州上空发现酿酒葡萄病害</stitle>; <id>;https://www.jpl。 nasa.gov/news/nasa-helps-spot-wine grape-disease-from-skies-skies-above-california </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T07：53：40.415518Z “ https://www.jpl.nasa.gov/news/nasa-helps-spot-wine grape-disease-disease-from-skies-skies-above-california”/>; <trucation>; <uctor>; <name>; kungfudoi </name>; </name>; <uri>; <uri >;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=kungfudoi</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://d2pn8kiwq2w21t.cloudfront.net/original_images/1 -dised_grapes_au-cals-agritech-oct012021-214.jpg“ style =” width：220px;高度：147px;“ />;<br />;利用美国宇航局喷气推进实验室开发的机载科学仪器，研究人员找到了一种方法来准确检测每年造成数十亿美元农作物损失的葡萄病害。遥感技术可以帮助及早发现和监测该病害，从而有可能使农作物免遭重大损失。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nasa-helps-spot-wine grape-disease-from-skies-skies-above-california" target="_blank">; [摘要] a href =“ https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37011977” target =“ _ black”>; [commist] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entern>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base =“ base =” https：https：https：https：https：https：https：https：https：https：https： //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;记住失误：诞生了一代艺术家的曼哈顿街道</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com /books/2023/aug/01/slip-new-york-agnes-martin-ellsworth-kelly-kelly </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T09：53：40.417347Z </doude>; <link href = <link href =' https://www.theguardian.com/books/2023/aug/01/the-slip-new-yew-york-agnes-martin-ellsworth-kelly“/>; <ucture>; <name>; <names>; prismatic>; prismatic </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= prismatic </uri>; </uri>; <content type =“ html”>; <img src =“ https://i.guim.co.uk/img/媒体/A3A80FEB5350BB656C4B33B8320438FC6E136AD2/0_6_5416_5415/MASTER/MASTER/MASTER/5416.JPG？ />; <br />; Slip是曼哈顿金融区的一条小街，在1950年代后期至1960年代后期是艺术家社区的所在地。他们在仓库中廉价和非法生活，制作了改变美国艺术的开创性作品。艺术家的灵感来自于滑动的独特环境，但最终，它们被驱逐出境，建筑物被摧毁。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#remembering-the-slip-the-manhattan-street-that-birthed-a- Generation-of-artists" target="_blank">;[摘要]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37030258" target="_blank">; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entern>; </entry>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Elixir Livebook 是文档的秘密武器</stitle>; <id>;https://fly.io/blog/ livebook-for-app-documentation/</id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T00：53：40.420452Z </updated>; <link href =“ https:///fly.io/blog/live/livebook/livebook-for-app--app--app--app--app-- Documentation/“/>; <aunder>; <Name>; behnamoh </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=behnamoh </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; </uter>; <content type type =“ html”>; <img src =“ https://fly.io/blog/livebook-for-app-documentation/assets/livebook-gamestate.webp“ style =” width：220px; height; height; height; height; 316px;''' />;<br />;Livebook 是 Elixir 对 Jupyter Notebook 的回应，提供文档、交互式探索和公开应用程序逻辑。它允许开发人员试验代码、执行代码并演示项目的中心思想。 Livebook 可以用来以一种新的、很棒的方式记录应用程序的核心部分。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#elixir-livebook-is-a-secret-weapon-for-documentation" target="_blank">; <title type =“ text”>;将我的框架笔记本电脑变成一个小桌面</stitle>; <id>; <id>; 2023/08/turning-my-framework-raptop-ainto-a tiny-desktop-was-was-fun-now-now-it-it-it-in-a-job/</id>; <更新>; 2023-08-08-07T11：53：40.4252233：40.4252233 z </updated>; <aunder>; <名称>; interpol_p </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= = interpol_p </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; <content>; <content type =” html “>; <img src =” https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/07/slabtop2-800x533.jpg“ style =” width：220px;身高：147px;“ />; <br />;框架的维修友好型和升级的笔记本电脑已经成功。用户可以通过将主板，内存和存储转换为定制打印的冷却器主人，将旧笔记本电脑转换为台式机案例。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#turning-my-framework-laptop-laptop-into-a-tiny-desktop" target="_blank">; [摘要] </a>; <a href =“ https://news.ycombinator.com/item？id = 37033014” target =“ _ blank”>; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base =“ https：// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml“>; <title type =“ text”>;纯数学与遗传学之间的意外联系-theory-and-grountary-genetics </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T03：53：40.426162Z </updated>; <link href =“ https://www.physics.ox.ac.ac.ac.ac.ac.uk/news/编号keyory-and-genortolary-genetics”/>; <ause>; <name>; geox </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=geox </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; </user>; <内容类型=“ html”>; <img src =“ https://www.physics.ox.ac.ac.uk/themes/custom/custom/physics/img/awards/athena-swan-swan-swan-silver-award.png- ：220px;身高：135px;“ />; <br />;一个数学家，工程师，物理学家和医学科学家的跨学科团队发现了纯数学和遗传学之间的意外联系，揭示了对中性突变和有机体演变的见解。<a href = <a href = = “ https://hackernews.betacat.io/#unexped-link-betected-link-betqure-mathematics-and-genetics” target =“ _ blank”>; [summary] </a>; <A a href =“ https：// news。 ycombinator.com/item?id=37011776“ target =“ _ blank”>; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry>; <entry xml：base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed。 xml“>; <title type =” text“>; lk-99复制工作的索赔/报告的汇编</stitle>; <id>; https://forums.spacebattles.com/threads/claims/claims-emp------------------ -Ambient-Pressure-Superconductor.1106083/page-13 </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T08：53：40.427197Z </updated>; <link href =“房间的索赔 - 宾至如归 - ambient-pressure-superconductor.1106083/page-13“/>; <uctor>; <names>; <names>; cal85 </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user？ id = cal85 </uri>; </uri>; <content type =“ html”>; <img src =“ https://forums.spacebattles.com/data/data/svg/2/2/1691232926/202222222_favicon_favicon_192x192x192.png” =宽度：220px;身高：220px;“ />; <br />;我知道的所有复制工作的索赔 /报告的汇编。官方 /机构研究人员试图复制实验，而某些专家对原始LK-99实验仍然持怀疑态度。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#compilation-of-claims-reports-of-lk-99-replication-efforts" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href ="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37031724" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml“>; <title type =“ text”>; clojure中对懒惰序列的批评sin/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-07T06:53:40.428101Z</更新>; <link href="https://clojure-goes-fast.com/blog/clojures-deadly-sin/"/ >; <作者>; <名称>;robto</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=robto</uri>; </作者>; <content type="html">;<img src= “https://clojure-goes-fast.com/img/posts/laziness-they-have-no-idea.webp”样式=“宽度：220px；身高：220px;“ />; <br />;本文是对Clojure中懒惰序列的批评。它旨在提供对功能及其对Clojure社区的影响的客观分析。作者认为，懒惰不应该是定义的。 Clojure的特征并鼓励程序员减少对此的依赖。 </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37021933" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml: base =“ https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml”>; <title type =“ text”>; ravenchord - 钢琴的激进重新设计</stitle>; <id>; <id>; https://whipsaw.com/20233 /06/05/unveiling-ravenchord-a-radical-piano-redesign-from-dan-harden/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-06T23:53:40.429044Z</更新>; <link href="https ://whipsaw.com/2023/06/05/unveiling-ravenchord-a-radical-piano-redesign-from-dan-harden/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;anjel </名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=anjel</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://whipsaw.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/ 06/Environment-01_back-02-1024x576.png" style="宽度：220px;身高：124px;“ />; <br />; Ravenchord是对钢琴的根本重新设计，在修改其形状和情感的同时，保持乐器的音调。弦乐在钢琴前面以螺旋状的形状排列，使听众允许听众为了实时查看乐器的内部工作。这种面向面的配置将钢琴转化为新鲜，情感和逻辑的存在，为每个性能提供了一个额外的维度。<a href =“ https：// hackernews.betacat.io/#ravenchord-a-radical-redesign-of-the-piano" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37028223" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type =“ text”>; edsger dijkstra的一日工作周</stitle>; <id>; https://calnewport.com/edsger-dijkstras-one-day-workweek/ </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-08-07T04： 53:40.430044Z</更新>; <link href="https://calnewport.com/edsger-dijkstras-one-day-workweek/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;yarapavan </名称>; <uri>;https： //news.ycombinator.com/user?id=yarapavan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://calnewport.com/wp-content/uploads/2023/ 08/dijkstra-640px.jpg“ style =”宽度：220px;高度: 151px;" />;<br />;Edsger Dijkstra 是理论计算机科学领域的著名人物，在 Burroughs Corporation 工作期间，他度过了一段非常富有成效的时期，他每周只访问校园一天。尽管他的参与程度有所减少，在此期间，他撰写了近 500 篇研究文章。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#edsger-dijkstras-one-day-workweek" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37030027" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https: //hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;是什么导致澳大利亚冷冻薯条短缺以及这种情况会持续多久？</stitle>; <id>;https://www.sbs.com 。 /更新>; <link href="https://www.sbs.com.au/news/article/whats-causing-australias-frozen-chip-shortage-and-how-long-will-it-last/ljhcvjctq" />; <ause>; <Name>; andrewstuart </name>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id= andrewstuart </uri>; </uri>; </uri>; <content>; <content type type =“ html”>; <img <img src src =“ https://images.sbs.com.au/dims4/default/a8cf5b0/2147483647/strip/strip/true/crop/5615x3158 +1231/Resize/Resize/Resize/1280x720！ 2f％2FSBS-AU-BRIGHTSPOT.S3.AMAZONAWS.COM％2F63％2F96％2F091F28934E4CBA79195290A22AEB％2FGetTyImages-671770262.jpg＆Imwidth＆Imwidth = 1280 height: 124px;" />;<br />;由于洪水和潮湿天气，澳大利亚正经历薯片短缺，这影响了马铃薯种植者的产量。短缺导致临时替代和限制购买。预计短缺将持续下去在接下来的12个月中。 target =“ _ blank”>; <link href="https://pages.cs.wisc.edu/~kovar/hall.html"/>; <作者>; <名称>;crummy< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=crummy</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://pages.cs. wisc.edu/~kovar/fittedHall.gif" style="宽度：220px；高度：179px；" />;<br />;人们发现，锗中电阻率对温度的指数依赖性是一个天大的谎言。锗中的电子被限制在明确的能带内，这些能带被零电荷载流子密度的“禁区”分隔开。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#electron-band-sinstrupure-in-germanium-my-ass-my-ass-cr-2000" target="_blank">; <id>;https://www.t3.com/news/british-gas -Starts-to-turn-off-smart-smart-home-devices-forever </id>; <更新>; 2023-08-07T05：53：40.437453z </updated>; <link href =“ https：// www。 t3.com/news/british-gas-starts-tot-to-turn-off-hive-smart-smart-home-devices-forever”/>; <uctor>; <name>; Mindracer </name>; <uri>; <uri>; https：//weesh。 ycombinator.com/user?id=mindracer</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://cdn.mos.cms.futurecdn.net/z9HmcG2eCVVbszNxujCPu7-415-80。 jpg“ style =”宽度：220px;高度：125px;” />;<br />;British Gas 的智能家居品牌 Hive 将于本周和下个月关闭部分安全产品。 Hive Nano 1 Hub、Hive Camera 和 Hive Leak Sensor 将分别于 2023 年 8 月 1 日和 2023 年 9 月 1 日停止工作。其他几种设备也将于 2025 年关闭。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#british-gas-starts-to-turn-off-hive-smart-home-devices-forever" 目标=“ _ blank”>; [摘要] </a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37030481" target="_blank">; [注释] </a>; </a>; </content>; </entry>; </feed>;
